#summary Screenshots of the HUD, 1440x900, all on one page.

=Introduction=
Magenta text is generally indicator for last-damage-dealt. Cropped version can be found [http://code.google.com/p/gmang-tf2hud/wiki/ScreenshotsCropped here].

==Menus==
First is main menu, second is team menu, third is class menu. Models are animated and hotkeys work.

http://img12.imageshack.us/img12/4164/hudscreenmainmenugamefu.png

http://img529.imageshack.us/img529/8496/hudscreenteamsfull.png

http://img708.imageshack.us/img708/1593/hudscreenclassfull.png

==Scoreboards==
First scoreboard is minmode 1, second scoreboard is minmode 0; third is default SourceTV spectator screen, fourth is SourceTV spectator screen with cross health fileswap.

http://img651.imageshack.us/img651/1139/hudscreensb12pfull.png

http://img34.imageshack.us/img34/1051/hudscreensb32pfull.png

http://img413.imageshack.us/img413/7347/hudscreenmatchboxfull.png

http://img195.imageshack.us/img195/6963/hudscreenmatchcrossfull.png

==Scout==
The health and ammo appears that way for all classes. Bonk Energy Drink and Crit-A-Cola have color zones to indicate when the item's effect will wear off. Green = effect active, red = effect expired.

http://img691.imageshack.us/img691/4091/hudscreenscoutfull.png

==Soldier==
When overhealed, health turns light blue-cyan.

http://img249.imageshack.us/img249/6519/hudscreensoldierfull.png

==Pyro==
When below half, health turns dull yellow. Also shows payload race.

http://img205.imageshack.us/img205/750/hudscreenpyrofull.png

==Demoman==
Top is regular loadout, bottom is sword+shield loadout. Chargin' Targe charge meter notches indicate crit status: past orange notches is minicrit, past red notches is crit. Yellow text is decapitated heads.

http://img20.imageshack.us/img20/8513/hudscreenstickyfull.png

http://img532.imageshack.us/img532/6641/hudscreentargefull.png

==Heavy==
Shows CTF carried layout.

http://img823.imageshack.us/img823/8847/hudscreenheavyfull.png

==Engineer==
Also shows basic CTF layout.

http://a.imageshack.us/img80/7025/hudscreenengyfull.png

http://a.imageshack.us/img15/9289/hudscreenbuildingsfull.png

==Medic==
Top is uncharged Uber. Bottom is activated Uber. Also shows targetID's.

http://img143.imageshack.us/img143/4050/hudscreenmedicfull.png

http://img580.imageshack.us/img580/3319/hudscreenuberfull.png

===Sniper=
Huntsman chargeup has indicator notches for headshot damage values. Orange zone = 175+ damage on headshot, green = 200+, purple = 260+, grey = 300+.

http://img821.imageshack.us/img821/3175/hudscreensniperfull.png

==Spy==
Above is donning a disguise, below is disguise donned. Cloak meter is ItemEffectMeter, which means it's shared with things like Sandman, Jarate, and Buff Banner charge.

http://img190.imageshack.us/img190/965/hudscreenspyfull.png

http://img202.imageshack.us/img202/2540/hudscreendisguisefull.png

==Quickswitch==
Can be set to Valve default by deleting *ItemQuickSwitch.res*.

http://img532.imageshack.us/img532/8938/hudscreenquickswitchful.png

The HUD using a variety of Common Overrides and File Swaps (see Settings).
